monster_heart_beat
void monster_heart_beat(string race,
                        string guild,
                        mixed race_ob,
                        mixed guild_ob)
This method is called from inside the npc to do the heartbeat on the guild and race objects.

Parameters:
race - the race to do a heart beat on
guild - the guild to do a heart beat on
race_ob - the object to use for the race
guild_ob - the object to use for the guild
query_guild_path
string query_guild_path(string guild_name)
This method returns the path associated with the specified guild.

Parameters:
guild_name - the name of the guild
Returns:
the path of the guild
query_guilds
mapping query_guilds()
This method returns all the current guilds in the race object. It is a mapping with matches between the name of the guild and guild object.

Returns:
the race mapping
query_race_path
string query_race_path(string race_name)
This method returns the path associated with the specified race.

Parameters:
race_name - the name of the race
Returns:
the path of the race
query_races
mapping query_races()
This method returns all the current races in the race object. It is a mapping with matches between the name of the race and race object.

Returns:
the race mapping
query_valid_race
int query_valid_race(string race)
This method checks to see if the specified race is valid or not.

Parameters:
race - the race to check for validity
Returns:
1 if it exists, 0 if it does not
set_level
void set_level(int lvl,
               string race,
               string guild)
This method sets the level of the npc with the specified attributes.

Parameters:
